summary:
The first mod ive created so far! Some critics would be great:D

Modeled in Blender, textured in Photoshop!
General data:
value: 9860
damage: 136
descriptionHtml:
Modeled in Blender, textured in Photoshop!
-actually 4k textures
-1932 polygons

Hey, this is version 1.1 of my dagger "Kalt"                       8 july 2013

READ THIS:
The knife isent actually placed in the map, you have to craft it, or to cget it via console!


Installation:
Just drag the meshes and textures folder in the ones of your skyrim data folder!
Drag the esp in the Data folder itself!

Changes for 1.1:

-darken the diffuse texture
-optional dirty texture
-optional less-powerfull version, less value

Here is the link for a more balanced version of "Kalt", stats by NudeDragon, original files by me!
Give it a look, if you want a placed weapon and a more balanced gameplay!

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38074//?

Have fun with my mod, stay tuned for more updates, and tell me what you think about Kalt:D

All credits goes to me!Just send me a message for 
questions about re-releasing my mod or something else!
author: David Jungnickel
